column2: (a)  Minimum initial deposit of USD 15,000 or its equivalent in any other foreign currency brought into the country by the
applicant in either of following mechanisms:

i. 
remittances in foreign exchange received from outside Sri Lanka through the banking system in favour of the account

ii. 
foreign exchange brought into Sri Lanka by the account holder upon declaration, for upkeep in Sri Lanka; or

iii. 
transfers from Inward Investment Accounts or accounts maintained in the Offshore Banking Unit of the same account
interest earned in foreign currency on the funds held in the account.
